name: Negative Type
description:
Templarius Games Studios is proud to present a production by ROD Interactive.NEGATIVE TYPEROD Interactive proudly presents a story of Nate Byrne in a mission that exposes something dangerous and hidden under curtains.

Sent to retrieve a missing scientist on behalf of AltGen leader Jacob Herman, Unit For Special Operations member Nate Byrne is unaware just what he could uncover. Renowned for his determination and not failing a mission, Nate thinks this is a simple cut and dry search and retrieve mission. However, fate has other intentions for him.

What secret could be so bad to warrant sealing underground? A secret so dangerous that it could result in an uncontrollable outbreak if released.

Byrne is just about to find out...

Using the power of the Unreal Engine, prepare for creepy hallways and terrifying enemies all in beautiful Unreal quality.FEATURES
  • Third person gameplay with influences from classic Doom, with survival shooter elements.
  • Rich story about betrayal, pride, and resentment.
  • Easy to understand UI, for ease of reading in the heat of combat.
  • Exciting combat against a variety of monsters and in sprawling levels.
  • Puzzles will try and stop you. Make sure to not let them get in your way.
  • A variety of weapons available for use, some of which are special unlocks.
  • Adaptive gameplay based on the real world.

Experience Negative Type today!
